data.eml:eml: Description of two new cicada species of the genus Poviliana Boulard (Insecta: Hemiptera, Cicadoidea, Cicadidae) from New Caledonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Delorme, Quentin, Jourdan, Hervé, Mille, Christian (2015): Description of two new cicada species of the genus Poviliana Boulard (Insecta: Hemiptera, Cicadoidea, Cicadidae) from New Caledonia. Zootaxa 3957 (4): 489-500, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3957.4.9
